mapper.select: /** site.home.menu.service.SiteHomeMenuService.selectTopMenuList **/ SELECT DISTINCT A.SORT_OR ORD, A.MENU_NO, A.MENU_NM, 'Y' ROLYN FROM NWRK253TL A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.HGRK_MENU_NO = (SELECT MENU_NO FROM NWRK253TL WHERE HGRK_MENU_NO = 0) START WITH OPTR_PGM_NO IN ( SELECT B.OPTR_PGM_NO FROM NWRK252TL B WHERE B.OPTR_PGM_NO = A.OPTR_PGM_NO AND B.OPTR_AUTH_NO = #{optrAuthNo} ) CONNECT BY PRIOR HGRK_MENU_NO = A.MENU_NO ORDER BY 1,2

/** site.home.menu.service.SiteHomeMenuService.selectLeftMenuList **/ SELECT a.menu_no AS menuNo , a.menu_nm AS menuNm , c.optr_pgm_url_v AS optrPgmUrlV , a.hgrk_menu_no AS hgrkMenuNo , a.lvl FROM ( SELECT A.SORT_OR , A.MENU_NO , A.HGRK_MENU_NO , A.OPTR_PGM_NO , A.MENU_NM , A.USE_YN , level as lvl , rownum as row_or FROM NWRK253TL A start with MENU_NO = #{hgrkMenuNo} connect by prior MENU_NO = HGRK_MENU_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SORT_OR ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN NWRK250TL C ON C.OPTR_PGM_NO = A.OPTR_PGM_NO WHERE use_yn = 'Y' and EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM ( SELECT menu_no, menu_nm FROM NWRK253TL start with menu_no IN (select menu_no from NWRK252TL WHERE NWRK252TL.OPTR_PGM_NO = NWRK253TL.OPTR_PGM_NO AND NWRK252TL.OPTR_AUTH_NO = '0') connect by prior HGRK_MENU_NO = MENU_NO ) X WHERE x.menu_no = a.menu_no ) ORDER BY row_or

/** site.home.menu.service.SiteHomeMenuService.selectCheckAuthList **/ SELECT '1' INFO_TP, /** 프로그램 기본 정보 조회 **/ A.OPTR_PGM_NO, A.OPTR_PGM_ID, A.OPTR_PGM_URL_V, A.OPTR_PGM_GRP_NO, A.OPTR_PGM_NM FROM NWRK250TL A WHERE A.OPTR_PGM_URL_V LIKE #{requestUri}||'%' AND ROWNUM = 1 UNION ALL SELECT '2' INFO_TP, /** 사용자 권한 조회 **/ A.OPTR_PGM_NO, A.OPTR_PGM_ID, A.OPTR_PGM_URL_V, A.OPTR_PGM_GRP_NO, A.OPTR_PGM_NM FROM NWRK250TL A, NWRK252TL B WHERE A.OPTR_PGM_URL_V LIKE #{requestUri}||'%' AND A.OPTR_PGM_NO = B.OPTR_PGM_NO AND B.OPTR_AUTH_NO = #{optrAuthNo} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: /** site.home.menu.service.SiteHomeMenuService.commonIndvInfoInqHistService **/ INSERT INTO TB_LS_INDV_INFO_INQ_HIST (HIST_SEQ_NO, OPTR_PGM_NO, OPTR_PGM_NM, INDV_INFO_INQ_RSN_CN, QUERY_EXE_CN, OPTR_PGM_URL_V, INQ_T, CONN_USER_NO, CONN_USER_NM, CONN_DTM, CONN_IP, DCARD_YN) VALUES (SQ_LS_INDV_INFO_INQ_HIST.NEXTVAL, #{optrPgmNo}, #{optrPgmNm}, #{indvInfoInqRsnCn}, #{queryExeCn}, #{optrPgmUrlV}, 0, #{connUserNo}, #{connUserNm}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{connIp}, 'N')
mapper.select: /** site.home.menu.service.SiteHomeMenuService.selectMainEduUserList **/ SELECT FN_COMM_NM('560', EDU_OPTR_APPR_STAT_CD) AS EDU_OPTR_APPR_STAT_NM, EDU_OPTR_APPR_STAT_CD, COUNT(1) CNT FROM NWRK101TL WHERE EDU_OPTR_APPR_STAT_CD IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(EDU_OPTR_APPR_DTM, 1, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY EDU_OPTR_APPR_STAT_CD ORDER BY EDU_OPTR_APPR_STAT_CD

/** site.home.menu.service.SiteHomeMenuService.selectMainUserList **/ SELECT '총인원' GBN, COUNT(1) CNT FROM NWRK100TL UNION ALL SELECT '종사자' GBN, COUNT(1) CNT FROM NWRK100TL A, NWRK101TL B WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.MBR_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT '교육기간 담당자' GBN, COUNT(1) CNT FROM NWRK101TL WHERE EDU_OPTR_APPR_STAT_CD = '2'
